nodes.text: The racsan break was an period of reprieve observed by the TransGal circuit, a galactic professional swoop racing division, that followed a race on the planet of Corulag in 22 BBY. After emerging victorious on Corulag, Team Millennium Holos, a TransGal circuit team, observed the break.

The racsan break was mentioned in an issue of the HoloNet News feed (2002), Volume 531, Issue 54, which was published in-universe on the second day of the fifth month in 22 BBY. The article that referenced the break, entitled "Ominaz Keeps Top Ranking", was written by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens.
